item.title: Smithing
item.dc:creator: @_BOOM .:BOOM:.
item.description:
@_BOOM wrote:

case 192: // Use an item on object junk = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA(); int UsedOnObjectID = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); int UsedOnY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA(); int ItemSlot = (inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA() - 128); int UsedOnX = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA(); int ItemID = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); if (!playerHasItem(ItemID)) break; if (!antiHax()) break; if (UsedOnObjectID == 3994) { for (int fi = 0; fi < misc.smelt_frame.length; fi++) sendFrame246(misc.smelt_frame[fi], 150, misc.smelt_bars[fi]); sendFrame164(2400); // smelting = true; // smelt_id = ItemID; } if(UsedOnObjectID == 11666 && ItemID == 440 && playerLevel[13] >= 15){ deleteItem(440, 1); addItem(2351, 1); sM("You smith the iron ore."); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(135, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2638){ if(ItemID == 1710){ deleteItem(1710, 1); addItem(1712, 1); setAnimation(827); sM("You dip your amulet into the fountain of heros."); } if(ItemID == 2856 && clueStage == 18) doneClue(); if(ItemID == 1708){ deleteItem(1708, 1); addItem(1712, 1); setAnimation(827); sM("You dip your amulet into the fountain of heros."); } if(ItemID == 1706){ deleteItem(1706, 1); addItem(1712, 1); setAnimation(827); sM("You dip your amulet into the fountain of heros."); } if(ItemID == 1704){ deleteItem(1704, 1); addItem(1712, 1); setAnimation(827); sM("You dip your amulet into the fountain of heros."); } } if(UsedOnObjectID == 3827 || UsedOnObjectID == 3828 || UsedOnObjectID == 3831 || UsedOnObjectID == 3830){ if(ItemID == 954){ if(absX >= 3507 && absX <= 3512 && absY >= 9495 && absY <= 9501){ //absX = 3508; //absY = 9493; //heightLevel = 0; triggerTele(3508, 9493, 0); sM("You enter the kalphite queen lair."); } } } if(UsedOnObjectID == 409){ if(ItemID == 526){ deleteItem(526, 1); addSkillXP(40*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You receive some prayer experience."); setAnimation(894); stillgfx(625, UsedOnY, UsedOnX); } if(ItemID == 532){ deleteItem(532, 1); addSkillXP(80*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You receive some prayer experience."); setAnimation(894); stillgfx(625, UsedOnY, UsedOnX); } if(ItemID == 2856 && clueStage == 19) doneClue(); if(ItemID == 536){ deleteItem(536, 1); addSkillXP(120*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You receive some prayer experience."); setAnimation(894); stillgfx(625, UsedOnY, UsedOnX); } if(ItemID == 6729){ deleteItem(6729, 1); addSkillXP(200*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You receive some prayer experience."); setAnimation(894); stillgfx(625, UsedOnY, UsedOnX); } TurnPlayerTo(UsedOnX, UsedOnY); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2644 && ItemID == 1737){ deleteItem(1737, 1); addItem(1759, 1); setAnimation(894); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2349 && playerHasItem(2347)){ deleteItem(2349, 1); sM("You smith the bar into some gold."); addItem(995, 150); setAnimation(898); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(800*SMITHING, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2351 && playerHasItem(2347) && playerLevel[13] >= 15){ deleteItem(2351, 1); sM("You smith the bar into some gold."); addItem(995, 500); setAnimation(898); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(800*SMITHING, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2359 && playerHasItem(2347) && playerLevel[13] >= 60){ deleteItem(2359, 1); sM("You smith the bar into some gold."); addItem(995, 15000); setAnimation(898); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(3500*SMITHING, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2361 && playerHasItem(2347) && playerLevel[13] >= 70){ deleteItem(2361, 1); sM("You smith the bar into some gold."); addItem(995, 30000); setAnimation(898); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(5000*SMITHING, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2363 && playerHasItem(2347) && playerLevel[13] >= 85){ deleteItem(2363, 1); sM("You smith the bar into some gold."); addItem(995, 60000); setAnimation(898); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(10000*SMITHING, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 436 && playerHasItem(438)){ deleteItem(436, 1); deleteItem(438, 1); addItem(2349, 1); sM("You smith the tin and copper ore."); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(800*SMITHING, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 11666 && ItemID == 438 && playerHasItem(436)){ deleteItem(436, 1); deleteItem(438, 1); addItem(2349, 1); sM("You smith the tin and copper ore."); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(800*SMITHING, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 11666 && ItemID == 440 && playerLevel[13] >= 15){ deleteItem(440, 1); addItem(2351, 1); sM("You smith the iron ore."); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(1500*SMITHING, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 11666 && ItemID == 447 && playerLevel[13] >= 60){ deleteItem(447, 1); addItem(2359, 1); sM("You smith the mithril ore."); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(3500*SMITHING, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 11666 && ItemID == 449 && playerLevel[13] >= 70){ deleteItem(449, 1); addItem(2361, 1); sM("You smith the adamant ore."); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(5000*SMITHING, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 11666 && ItemID == 451 && playerLevel[13] >= 85){ deleteItem(451, 1); addItem(2363, 1); sM("You smith the runite ore."); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(10000*SMITHING, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 8101 && playerHasItem(1540, 1) && playerLevel[13] >= 85){ deleteItem(1540,1); deleteItem(8101,1); addItem(2621,1); addSkillXP(30000*SMITHING,13); setAnimation(899); sM("You smith the visage to the shield."); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); } if(ItemID == 5297 && (UsedOnObjectID == 8151 || UsedOnObjectID == 8389)){ farm(0, 259, 5297, 1200); } if(ItemID == 5299 && (UsedOnObjectID == 8151 || UsedOnObjectID == 8389)){ farm(0, 263, 5299, 1200); } if(ItemID == 5301 && (UsedOnObjectID == 8151 || UsedOnObjectID == 8389)){ farm(0, 265, 5301, 1200); } if(ItemID == 5302 && (UsedOnObjectID == 8151 || UsedOnObjectID == 8389)){ farm(20, 2481, 5302, 2000); } if(ItemID == 5303 && (UsedOnObjectID == 8151 || UsedOnObjectID == 8389)){ farm(20, 267, 5303, 4500); } if(ItemID == 5295 && (UsedOnObjectID == 8151 || UsedOnObjectID == 8389)){ farm(40, 257, 5295, 3000); } if(ItemID == 5300 && (UsedOnObjectID == 8151 || UsedOnObjectID == 8389)){ farm(35, 3000, 5300, 5300); } if(ItemID == 5296 && (UsedOnObjectID == 8151 || UsedOnObjectID == 8389)){ farm(60, 2998, 5296, 7500); } if ((UsedOnObjectID == 2781) || (UsedOnObjectID == 2728)) { // furnace, range if ( /* CheckForSkillUse2(ItemID, ItemSlot) == */true) { cookingOn = true; fishID = ItemID; } } break;

Ty.

item.title: Smithing
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

go to client.java and search twice for

targetSlot = itemType(wearID);

you should find something like this

int CLAttack = server.Wearing.GetCLAttack(wearID); int CLDefence = server.Wearing.GetCLDefence(wearID); int CLStrength = server.Wearing.GetCLStrength(wearID); int CLMagic = server.Wearing.GetCLMagic(wearID); int CLRanged = server.Wearing.GetCLRanged(wearID); int CLCrafting = server.Wearing.GetCLCrafting(wearID); int CLHitpoints = server.Wearing.GetCLHitpoints(wearID); int CLAgility = server.Wearing.GetCLAgility(wearID); int CLPrayer = server.Wearing.GetCLPrayer(wearID); int CLSlayer = server.Wearing.GetCLSlayer(wearID); int CLMining = server.Wearing.GetCLMining(wearID); int CLFishing = server.Wearing.GetCLFishing(wearID); int CLCooking = server.Wearing.GetCLCooking(wearID); int CLFarming = server.Wearing.GetCLFarming(wearID);

chech if you have this in there

int CLSmithing = server.Wearing.GetCLSmithing(wearID);

if you don’t , add it.

Read full topic
